entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 12. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
